summary: In another dimension, the villainous scientist Duke of Zill, with the help of his mechanical, geometric army, takes over the Land of Oriana, prompting Felix the Cat to save its princess and restore order once again.
cast: Chris Phillips|Marbry Steward|Peter Newman|Alice Playten|Susan Montanaro|Don Oriolo|Christian Schneider|David Kolin|Michael Fremer
keywords: animal character name as title|felix the cat character|five word title|hand drawn animation|traditional animation
title: Felix the Cat: The Movie
